data.event: The United Nations (UN) has confirmed six aid workers in South Sudan were killed on Saturday in what the UN representative called a "heinous murder."

event.title: This month, the South Sudanese government also announced

data.event: This month, the South Sudanese government also announced plans to increase visa fees for humanitarian workers to US$10,000.
UN figures suggest 7.5 million South Sudanese now require humanitarian aid, with one million verging on starvation.
